title: [Satira's Outfitting]
[Satira's General Store]
[Satira's Magic Shoppe]
description: Enclosed by blue watered silk walls, the shop features a pile of striped throw pillows in the center of its oak floor.  A square mithril-framed window hangs under the fel panel ceiling.  Right near the front is a lacquered wooden shelf and a gilded maple table.
